column2: Fine Serapi Area Rug 8x10 Handmade Wool Oriental Rug, Deep Red Tribal Geometric Pattern Living Room Carpet
column3:
Add rich character and timeless style to your space with this handmade Fine Serapi wool rug, featuring an intricate tribal geometric layout filled with symbolic motifs and balanced symmetry. The deep red field is beautifully layered with blue, green, gold, ivory, and soft turquoise accents, creating a vibrant yet harmonious centerpiece for any room.

Fine Serapi rugs are known for their detailed craftsmanship, bold patterns, and durable wool construction, making them ideal for living rooms, dining areas, and statement interiors. This rug is hand-knotted from 100% natural wool, offering a dense texture, long-lasting durability, and a comfortable feel underfoot.

The carefully arranged medallions and decorative borders create visual depth and movement while maintaining balance, making this rug a striking focal point without overwhelming the space.

Rug Details

Design: Fine Serapi

Pattern: Tribal geometric with multiple medallion motifs

Primary Colors: Deep red

Accent Colors: Blue, green, gold, ivory, turquoise

Material: 100% natural wool

Construction: Hand-knotted

Condition: New

Size:

Feet: 8.2 x 10.4 ft

Centimeters: 250 x 314 cm

Pile: Medium wool pile, durable and comfortable

Ideal For:

✔ Living rooms & dining rooms
✔ Statement interiors
✔ Offices & creative spaces
✔ Bold, warm, and layered décor styles
